title: Monique Duson, A Refuge for People Injured by Critical Race Theory
description:
After Monique appeared with Alisa Childers' channel https://youtu.be/FwyJk1G_Dm0  a number of my viewers very much wanted me to have a conversation with her, so we did. As usual I wanted her to share her story. It's a good story and she tells it well. I think you will enjoy her. 

https://www.centerforbiblicalunity.com/

Grandmother took her to church
92 Rodney King riots, reginal denny was beaten

Biola University

South Africa

Repenting from social justice

Framework of critical race theory

Historically, what has the church believed

Just over 2 years. 

November 2019, wanted you to start speaking out. 

Center for biblical unity

Krista, center for biblical unity

Lauren Hill

The current state of the church: the road to hell is paved with good intentions

Refuge for people injured by critical race theory

Battering ram 

One race, one people, one savior

Don't repay evil for evil

What is a biblical method for unity? 

Every Thursday at 6pm, family meeting livestream, CfBU Facebook page

Podcast with Krista, "all the things" 

5 months old Patreon https://centerforbiblicalunity.com 

Making sure the Church has a biblical framework for Unity

Edwin Ramirez. 

Confronting injustice without compromising truth

My interview on Unsafe Space https://youtu.be/Cq56D02-4HQ

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU 

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/
